title: Market Growth Analysis
description: a Health Insurance company wants to explore a potential insurance market, Vehicle Insurance. Through the data collected by the company I aim to identify factors that contribute to the purchase of Vehicle insurance. This would provide a foundation relation between Health and Vehicle Insurance. Further I would analyse the factors and evaluate whether Vehicle Insurance will be a profitable market for the company.

title: Fraudulent Detector
description: Our client is Eden Data, one of the reknowned Cyber Security company in the USA that focuses on make internet a safe space to make online transactions. Recently, they observed that there has been a peak in the number of fraudulent activity on internet and to ensure the safety of their customers they want us to help analyse the features of potential fraudulent activity
